text: <!channel> For those working on specs, make sure you are using 1X values.

<!channel>: You should all now have access to the Comp Share 2 Folder on Dropbox, so please make sure each of your sections have the most updated files by the end of the day. Thank you! <https://www.dropbox.com/home/Compass%20-%20team%20share/02_Comp_Share>

For anyone that could use the explanation or just a refresher for this spec process, this is a pretty good guide to iOS resolution differences: <https://www.paintcodeapp.com/news/iphone-6-screens-demystified>

attachments.title: iPhone 6 Screens Demystified
attachments.text: Articles about PaintCode's new features, interviews, application development topics.

text: <!channel>: For those of you working on specs, just a heads up that some of the headers might change since we need to add a 30px option in Adineue Pro Regular
Should we dedicate a code for it now so we know what will change or should we append it to the end of our Hx list so nothing else changes?
I just wrote in the changes on the bored by Philip if you want to take a look.
What’s our universal margin again? 36pt?
ah, already confusing myself, that’s 36px @2x...
18pt then?
I belive so
cool thx
<!channel>: please be sure to upload the latest and greatest comps to dropbox before leaving tonight
<@U0XCJ372R>: thanks for handling the spec for Sharing!

EDO Update:

I finished the specs on the global list views and I'm nearly done with profile and setting key screens. I also have my latest comps on the dropbox.

Tomorrow I’ll share my screens after we meet in the morning to make sure no changes need to be made. I plan to finish the key screens for profile and settings then move on to the Sharing screens.
Matt’s PSDs <https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B27TTIpZahHcRzY4UEw2cWFMSDQ>
<@U0260V1BX|melissa> pinned a message to this channel.
<@U0260V1BX>: thankkkkkks :slightly_smiling_face:

EOD Update:
• still working through specs on my key screens

Tomorrow:
• finish specs for keys
• share my final designs on dropbox (pending approvals)
• move on to onboarding screens

hey <@U02AUNA0P> just looking through the cards in the comp share folder, I’m not seeing any dismissable cards. Some of the cards in the wires have close buttons, so we’ll have to account for that in the visuals. Typically we’d use a swipe to reveal actions but since not all cards will be dismissable I don’t want to introduce an interaction pattern that’s not common among all of the elements on the screen.
hmm okay I'll take a look at that when I get home.
Thanks for the heads up
np

EOD update:

finished up spec for all key screens except for the add workout section (since there were updates made today).

just updated the screens on dropbox for the home screen that include dismissible cards along with updating the card design folder. 

melodee, since some of the cards on the home screen now include a close button, i had to nudge the card titles up 4px (@1x), so the top padding is now 24px (not 28px). i’ll show you tomorrow morning when i get in.

—

tomorrow:

• implement design changes to add workout section
• design out 3rd party device connection screens
• finish up spec work for sections mentioned above
